did.unittitle: Rochester, New York and Vicinity Labor Council, AFL-CIO Records, 1956-2007

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Rochester and Vicinity Labor Council, AFL-CIO

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract:
This collection consists of manuscript sheets, pamphlets,
constitutions, unbound newspapers, computer disks,
photographs and some memorabilia.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Rochester, New York and Vicinity Labor Council, AFL-CIO Records #6239. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
